Name: Madville+
About the game: Madville+ is an arena shooter with rogue-lite elements, where you fight incoming waves of aliens and customize your guns as you progress. It is designed to have short play sessions (30-40 min) and replayability. - Lots of guns - Lots of add-ons for your guns. - Lots of aliens - Lots of dice and random effects - Ridiculous challenges
